name: The Dice Tower
description:
THE DICE TOWER

Roll the dice and try your luck in The Dice Tower. Defeat the monsters of the tower and survive as long as you can. If luck is on your side the monstrous denizens of the tower may be few and far but if not you may not survive.

Controls

WASD / Arrow Keys - Move

Left Click - Shoot

SUBMITTED TO GMTK GAME JAM 2022 - The Theme is "Roll of the Dice"

Programmers

J-Flex   -   WGCFox

Art

CountingWithTeeth

Music and SFX

SoooSquishy

(Couple of sound effects sourced online)

Gate opening sound by, Useful Sound Effects.
